dialogue: Quinn, you've done such a great job today, it's really put me in a splendid mood. Emma, come over here for a grope.
Ah, there's nothing like the feeling of a young intern's pert breasts while you're drinking a morning cup of tea.
Although...I think this would be slightly more pleasant if your bra wasn't in the way. Why don't you take it off, young lady?
Yes, sir. Whatever you say, sir.
Fantastic! Now THAT's how you start a morning! You really should try it sometime, Quinn.
I'd love to, sir. How about right now?
Not at the present, kiddo. I've got another task for you. But first, why don't you take Emma...
...to whoever gave you this marvellous teabag. I'm sure he'd love a turn with her.
